ability.name: Blade Vigor
ability.text: Heals (4% max HP + 100/105/110 AP) and deals [25/40/55 AP + 100/150/225 AD] damage to current target. Healing and damage increase up to 100% based on missing HP.

ability.name: Rising Spell Force
ability.text: Fires a blast at current target, dealing [230/350/600 AP + 115/175/300 AD] damage. Blinks a short distance, then gains 25% attack speed for 5s and +4 AD and +4 AP per Potential for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Mighty Blade of Justice
ability.text: Heals for 8% max HP + [330/360/390 AP] and deals [10% HP + 80/100/125 AD] to the target. On cast, gain 1 stack; each stack grants +4 max HP plus +2/4/6 max HP per Potential for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Gadagadagada!
ability.text: Passive: Gain 8% Attack Speed per consecutive attack on the same target (up to 80%). Active: For 6s, gain 90% AD and grant 2 nearby allies [20/25/35 %] AD, prioritizing attack-focused allies.

ability.name: Spirit Spear
ability.text: Hurls a spear at the farthest enemy, dealing [440/660/1035 AD + 60/90/135 AP] to the first enemy hit. If that enemy dies, the spear continues and applies the overkill damage to the next enemy hit.

ability.name: Unleash the Demon
ability.text: Passive: Attacks deal [33/50/75 AP] bonus damage. Gains additional power by Tactician level. Level 6+: every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals [50/75/110 AP] damage and Shreds 20% MR for 3s. Level 9+: every attack launches a (farther-traveling) wave with the same damage and shred.

ability.name: Eye of the Hurricane
ability.text: Heal [5% HP + 210 AP], then deal [130/195/300 AP] damage to the 2 nearest enemies and stun them for 1s.

ability.name: Twin Cannon Fire
ability.text: Fire 4 shots towards the target. Each deals [85/130/225 AP] damage to the first enemy hit. For each miss, restore [8/8/15] mana.

ability.name: Regolith Resistance
ability.text: Passive: Gain 12 Armor per item equipped. Active: Deal [60 AP + 405% Armor] damage to enemies in a cone.

ability.name: Spinning Soul-Saw
ability.text: Gain a [90/110/150 AD] shield for 2s, then deal [150/225/340 AD] damage to the target.

ability.name: Unbreakable Celestial Lance
ability.text: Deal [130/195/295 AP] damage in a short line through the target, then reduce damage taken by [20/30/45 %] for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Star Cutter
ability.text: Launch a returning blade 2 hexes through the current target. It deals [170/255/385 AD + 20/30/45 AP] damage to enemies hit, reduced by 40% per hit.

ability.name: Bright Star Blast
ability.text: Deal [215/325/485 AP] damage to the target and reduce their Magic Resist by 10.

ability.name: Reality Ripple
ability.text: Heal [240/280/350 AP], then deal [7% HP + 150 AP] magic damage to enemies within a 1-hex radius.

ability.name: Steel Chair Slam
ability.text: Passive: Every 7 seconds the next attack deals [8% HP + 50/75/125 AD] bonus physical damage. Gain [240/280/350 AP] maximum health over 1.5 seconds and immediately trigger the passive.

ability.name: Golden Giga Gun
ability.text: Deal [305/460/815 AD] damage to the lowest health enemy within 2 hexes. If the target dies, [30% AP] chance to gain 1 gold.

ability.name: Crystal Chrysalis
ability.text: Grant [80/100/135] shield to the 2 lowest Health allies for 4 seconds and fire 4 butterflies dealing [520/780/1240 AP] damage split between the 2 closest enemies.

ability.name: The Curtain Falls
ability.text: Passive: Attack Speed is always [0.75/0.75/0.85]. Convert 1% bonus Attack Speed into 0.8% Attack Damage. Every fourth attack is enhanced to deal [220/330/510 AD] damage.

ability.name: Missile Massacre
ability.text: Passive: Kills grant 1% permanent Attack Damage. Active: Fire 8 missiles divided between the target and nearby enemies. Each missile deals [6/8/14 AP + 32/48/75 AD] damage.

ability.name: Teleports Behind You
ability.text: Blink to the enemy with the lowest health within 2 hexes and deal [140/210/325 AP] damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius. Blink again, dealing 13% per potential of first blink damage.

name: Lux
text: Fire an energy ball towards the largest group of enemies containing the target. On arrival, 20% Shred enemies in a 1-hex radius for 5 seconds and deal [300/450/700 AP] damage split between them plus [90/135/210 AP] damage to each.

ability.name: Crystal Chrysalis
ability.text: Heal [350/400/625 AP] and deal [55/85/130 AP] damage to the 3 closest enemies. Heal the 2 lowest percent Health allies for [55/65/85 per potential] health

ability.name: Power Suit: Full Charge
ability.text: Shield [400/475/575 AP] for 4 seconds. The next 3 attacks deal [75/115/175% magic resist] bonus true damage

name: Vi
text: Passive: Gain 2 Armor and 2 Magic Resist for each component equipped to your team. Active: Heal [230/280/330 AP], deal [150/225/350 AD] damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target, and 20% Sunder enemies hit for 4 seconds.

name: Xayah
text: Gain [80% AP] attack speed for 3 attacks. These attacks deal [50/75/115 AD] bonus physical damage to the target and 2 nearby enemies

ability.name: Guarding Crescent
ability.text: Heal [290/360/450 AP], deal [100/150/235 AD] damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius, and mark the current target. For 3 seconds, take 40% reduced damage from unmarked enemies.

ability.name: Pure Heart Breaker
ability.text: Deal [460/690/1275 AP] damage to the current target, increased up to 50% based on the target's missing health. If the target dies, deal 55% of overkill damage split between the 2 closest enemies, plus [10/15/25 AP] magic damage per target

ability.name: Magic Bouncing Bullet
ability.text: Fire a bullet at the farthest enemy, dealing [330/495/790 AD + 30/45/70 AP] physical damage to the first target hit. The bullet bounces to a nearby enemy, dealing [85/130/205 AD] physical damage. Bullets bounce additional [3/5/7 potential] times

ability.name: Grand Guillotine
ability.text: Heal [90/130/170 AP], then deal [215/325/520 AD] physical damage to the current target, increased by 60% against Tanks. If the target dies, immediately recast dealing 75% damage.

ability.name: Thundering Hammerstrike
ability.text: Deal [180/270/425 AD + 20/30/50 AP] physical damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. Shoot [3/5/7 potential] sparks split between the 3 nearest enemies. Sparks deal [70/105/170 AD] physical damage and reduce armor by [3/5/7 potential]

name: Malzahar
text: Infect the closest 1 uninfected targets, dealing [515/775/1315 AP] magic damage over 15 seconds. If an infected target dies, the infection spreads to the nearest uninfected target for any remaining time.If all enemies are infected, this effect can stack.

name: Neeko
text: Gain 40% Durability and heal [300/350/450 AP] over 2 seconds, and then deal [120/180/290 AP] magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

name: Senna
text: Over 1 second, deal [360/540/875 AD + 40/60/95 AP] physical damage in a line through the current target. Enemies after the first take 22% damage instead. When no targets are left, regain mana based on the time remaining.

name: Swain
text: Gain [10% HP + 300/340/380 AP] max Health, then deal [25/35/55] magic damage every second to enemies in a 2-hex radius. Subsequent casts heal [10% HP + 300/340/380 AP] and increase the damage by [6/9/14].

name: Udyr
text: Make 3 rapid attacks. Each heals Udyr for [130/170/220 AP] and deals [35/50/80] additional damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius.

name: Viego
text: Passive: Attacks deal additional [30/45/80 AP] damage. Active: The next three attacks unleash a devastating combo. Pommel Bash: Deal [100/150/270 AP] magic damage. Rising Slash: Deal [100/150/270 AP] magic damage and briefly Stun the target. Falling Slash: Deal [210/315/560] magic damage.

name: Yasuo
text: Deal [150/225/360 AD + 30/45/70 AP] physical damage to 3 closest enemies.

name: Ziggs
text: Passive: Attacks are bouncing bombs that deal additional [50/75/120 AP] magic damage to the first enemy hit. Active: Deal [230/345/550 AP] magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

name: Akali
text: Mark the farthest unmarked target within 4 hexes, then dash through all marked enemies in order. Each dash deals [95/145/1000 AP] magic damage to its target and [80/120/1000] magic damage to other enemies hit. If only one enemy remains dash 3 times instead

name: Ashe
text: The next 8 attacks fire bonus arrows dealing [136/208/1000 AD + 8/16/80 AP] total physical damage split between the target and up to two random enemies within 2 hexes.

name: Jarvan IV
text: Gain [12% HP + 400/450/1500] Shield for 4 seconds, then slam into a group of enemies, dealing [100/150/3000 AP] magic damage to enemies within a 2 hex radius and Stunning them for [1.5/1.75/8] seconds

name: Jinx
text: Passive: Attacks grant [6/6/30% AP] stacking Attack Speed, up to [60/60/300% AP]. Critical strikes instead grant [9/9/40% AP]. Active: Deal [200/300/900 AD] physical damage to the target and [575/875/4000 AD] physical damage split across a 2-hex radius centered on the target.

name: Poppy
text: Gain [10% HP + 280/330/900 AP] Shield for 4 seconds. When it breaks, deal [250/375/4000 AD] physical damage to the target and [125/200/1500 AD] physical damage to other enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. The target is Stunned for [0.5/0.5/8] seconds based on how long the shield held, and other enemies are briefly stunned.

name: Ryze
text: Deal [770/1155/6000 AP] magic damage to the target over 3 seconds. Enemies in a 1-hex radius around the target take [110/165/1200 AP] damage over the same duration.

name: Samira
text: Passive: After casting, gain 1 Style and 5%% Omnivamp, up to 4 stacks. At max stacks, the next cast is Inner Arsenal Unleashed. Soul Shot: Deal [105/160/650 AD] physical damage to the target and dash a short distance. Inner Arsenal Unleashed: Double the passive bonus and leap to a nearby group of enemies, dealing [230/345/2200 AD + 50/75/225 AP] damage to all enemies in a 2-hex radius. Reset your Style to 0.

name: Sett
text: Over a short duration, heal [12% HP + 260/335/1500 AP] and deal [140/210/2000 AD] physical damage to the target. Then, deal [4% + 120/180/750 AD] physical damage in a cone. Enemies in the center line take [10/15/45] more physical damage, increased based on healing received this combat.

name: Volibear
text: Passive: Every 4th attack deals [125/190/750 AD] physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. When changing targets, immediately slam for 70% damage. Active: For 5 seconds gain [125/125/500%] Attack Speed, [10/10/25% AP] Omnivamp, and crowd control immunity.

name: Yuumi
text: Launch 20 pages dealing [25/38/150 AP] magic damage each, split between the target and enemies within 2 hexes. Each subsequent cast launches 4 more pages. Every 4 pages, launch a bonus page that deals [15/23/90 per potential] true damage.

name: Braum
text: Stun the target and spin them around for 1.5 seconds, dealing [575/865/9001 AD] physical damage to the target and [310/465/4501 AD] physical damage to other enemies in a 2-hex radius. THen throw the target forward, dealing [100/150/2000 AD] physical damage in a 1-hex area around the target. If the targt drops below [18/18/18% AP] health, throw them off the board instead

name: Gwen
text: Passive: Attacks deal [10/15/400 AP] magic damage, and [40/60/1000 AP] magic damage split between enemies in a cone. Every 3rd cast is Rip The Threads. Soul Stitch: Fire 3 needles through the board, dealing [35/55/1000 AP] damage to enemies hit and leaving threads behind. Rip The Threads: Deal [320/450/9999 AP] magic damage split between all enemies and [80/120/9001 AP] bonus magic damage to each. Enemies near at least one thread take 10% more damage.

name: Lee Sin
text: Field Lee Sin to choose a stance. Each stance has a unique ability, and grants Lee Sin a bonus trait.

name: Seraphine
text: Passive: Ultimate Friendship Bomb's damage scales on Power of Friendship, which is based on all of your team's bonus stats. Stats on Seraphine contribute more. Active: Fire a friendship bomb towards the largest group of enemes within 1 hexes, dealing magic damage in a 2-hex radius.

name: Twisted Fate
text: Passive: Attacks bounce between 3 enemies, dealing [35/55/999 AP] bonus magic damage and marking enemies hit. Attacks deal 30% reduced damage per hit. Active: Deal [200/300/9999 AD] physical damage to the [4/4/20] closest enemies, and detonate their marks for [15/25/500 AP] magic damage each

name: Varus
text: Passive: Gain mana when units die. Enemies grant 5, allies 3. Active: Fire 3 piercing arrows per second at random enemies until Varus is out of mana. Each arrow costs [12/12/6] mana and deals [85/130/666 AD + 10/15/200 AP] physical damage, reduced by 35% per hit.

name: Yone
text: Passive: attacks grant [4.5/4.5/25%] stacking Attack Speed and Movement Speed, and alternate between dealing [25/40/400 AD] bonus true damage and [100/160/999 AP] bonus magic damage. Active: Send an echo towards the two furthest enemies, dealing [120/180/9999 AD] physical damage and briefly Stunning enemies hit.

name: Zyra
text: Summon [4/4/20] untargetable Thornspitters that deal [90/135/999 AP] magic damage per attack and attack 4 times. Non-plant allies gain [10% + 25/40/999% AP] Attack Speed decaying over 4 seconds
